name: warehouse
description: web-based application for finding warehouse property

scripts.idependencies: cd src && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd src && cd client && npm run build
scripts.test: cd src && cd client && npm run test
scripts.client: cd src && cd client && npm start
scripts.server: cd src && cd server && npm run dev
scripts.server-build: cd src && cd server && npm run build

author: Mohamed Salem
